overview: Paddy Noonan, IMRadio Founder and Musician, over the past few years, started an underground movement of musicians in Chicago, which now has united thousands of artists from over seventy-five countries to start a new radio station..IMRadio. Any artist in the world can upload an original song for free airplay on IMRadio for thousands to enjoy and listen to. As an â€œopen sourceâ€ radio station, IMRadio has attracted an audience of thousands and has received much recognition from music industry scouts. IMRadio stands for â€œindependent musicianâ€ radio, and its number one purpose is to help generate revenue for the independent musician.
